overview.en: Celes Chain is a regulated public chain RegTech solution for regulators, institutions and other blockchain applications to help institutions to develop regulated applications and services easier and more efficient, eventually benefiting all users.
overview.zh: Celes Chain 是一个为监管机构，机构和其他区块链开发的受监管的区块链公链和监管科技，帮助机构更方便和有效的开发受监管的应用和业务，用户最终获益。
